meanings.definition: To surpass in brightness or splendor.
meanings.sent1: The sun outdazzles the stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her smile outdazzles all the other smiles in the room.
meanings.sent3: The glittering unicorn outdazzles the ordinary horses in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display outdazzles the city lights on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent5: The diamond outdazzles all the other gems in the jewelry store.

meanings.definition: To outshine or outdo in a dazzling manner.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks show outdazzles the simple bonfire.
meanings.sent2: Her performance outdazzles all the others on stage.
meanings.sent3: The flashy magician outdazzles the regular performers at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The bright full moon outdazzles the dim streetlights.
meanings.sent5: The sparkling waterfall outdazzles the calm lake.
